pages.text: The Lunarsign Prism is a magical item that reveals the current phase and event of the moon.$(br)When used, it displays the name of the current moon phase and event, offering insight into the celestial changes.$(br)Have a chance to be dropped by witches.

$(br)$(o)$(#248A8B)'In ancient times, witches would use the Lunarsign Prism to align their rituals with the cycles of the moon. This enchanted artifact holds the secrets of moon.$(br)It is said that certain rituals can be performed more swiftly  or more slowly under specific lunar conditions.'
